title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
on, take a rest at the camp when you are ready to trigger the next sequence.

If The Grand Duke is alive:

Mizora asked us to meet her in camp. She has an important proposal to make regarding Wyll's father, Grand Duke Ravengard.

If the Grand Duke died:

Grand Duke Ravengard is dead. Wyll's patron, Mizora, awaits us in camp. Perhaps she can help.

You will be visited by Mizora at some point at Camp after a long rest. She will offer Wyll a deal.

Here, you will meet the sisters of Justice. Wyll w
